How was your experience with us? Maybe later Never Feedback Submit Cancel Suggest us what went wrong and we\'ll work on it!
Invalid destination address. Service not activated on network. Message expired or not available. Couldn\'t send due to network problem. Currently can\'t send your message. It will be sent when the service becomes available. Can\'t download right now. Try again later. No APN specified for the app, you need to set it up in settings! (No subject) Unknown sender Couldn\'t download message
OK Sender does not support replies Backup and Restore Currently, only SMS is supported by backup and restore.\nMMS support and scheduled backup and will be coming soon! Last Backup Select backup Restore Backup Now Are you sure you want to export messages ? Are you sure you want to import messages ? No backup available Backups /Message/Backup Backing up messages Restore Messages Next Let\'s Go Please grant Notification permission from App Settings
Welcome to Text Messages App Best Experience with yours, share photos and videos with high quality…
Take Backup and Restore SMS One touch to Backup and Restore your Messages…
Set Default App To send or receive messages, You must set as the default app…
Set As Default Application To send or receive messages, You must set it as the default application. Do you want the messages to become your default application ?
Notification Permission A permission is required when Messages App receive messages notification, You must allow permission.
